tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @RedIndustries2 @BorisJohnson @pow_rebecca @NewsNBC @SimonTagg @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @Sotlive Thanks for the swift reply Aaron and the explanation…transparency is key. This letter will haunt the operator and EA for years… #stopthestink

Today’s #50teams50days focuses on our work in waste crime. It’s perhaps a lesser known side of #TeamEA - working with partners to tackle organised crime groups who use waste to make a quick buck - great blog here from Stephanie on her frontline role https://t.co/LNb9Y5txDW https://t.co/Yu74BJFHIH
This week @EnvAgencyNW have launched new #flood warnings in #Wigan & #Lancaster. Sign up at https://t.co/kHRIobecSL #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/8amTrgLD6X

Lots of avoidable plastics can be found in our lunchboxes. Pick up some hints and tips to change your plastic habits by watching this @EnvAgency #WorldOceanDay film for #schools. #preventingplasticpollution #sourcetosea https://t.co/TKVCKaxoy7

@CityofYork @katerav @jnbentley @YorkCycle @YorkBikeBelles @Fr_RowntreePark @KilbanePete @JonnyPolitics @AndyDAgorne @RosieMicklegate @GarethDennis We raised this issue as a matter or urgency with our contractors. A banksman is now on site on Butcher Terrace from 07:30 and 09:30 and 14:30 and 17:00 to redirect any large vehicles. Please contact us if you have any queries: yorkfloodplan@environment-agency.gov.uk https://t.co/TRV0St7eGl

It rains, water companies dump sewage. #standard @EnvAgency ? 
Use the @sascampaigns app to check your local water quality https://t.co/JrxjgVK5SS

Working with @BumblebeeTrust to plant wildflowers we funded to enhance Pett Sea Wall for #Bumblebees. This will also provide habitat for a wide range of pollinator species. Bees help to #pollinate the plants needed for people and wildlife #WorldBeeDay #TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/eFlknvzLcV

We gave @DefraGovUK national pollinator strategy funding to the @BumblebeeTrust who bought wildflowers that will provide early foraging bees with pollen. Bees help to #pollinate the plants needed for people and wildlife #WorldBeeDay #TogetherForOurPlanet - https://t.co/rCtgOticl5 https://t.co/vJpRmKpSuR

DYK it's #WorldBeeDay ? This week we have been out on Pett Level planting knapweed to aid the re-establishment of the short-haired bumblebee and help deliver @DefraGovUK's National #Pollinator Strategy @BumblebeeTrust @EnvAgencySE  @bbcsoutheast https://t.co/SKu8KgsQfK
@cllr_alambritis @Wandle_Trust @CanalRiverTrust @Merton_Council @LDN_environment @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency Thank you 🙏

urls.title: Hazwaste tycoon jailed for six months
urls.description: The chief executive and the marketing director of Atlantic Waste - a company bought by investment firm Augean in 2005 - have been jailed for hiring detectives to tap phones and hack into the computers of Environment Agency officers and council staff.
